title: Raspberry Pi Automatic Plant Waterer
one_line_description: This is a hobby project of mine that I took up to improve my software engineering skills across the full stack. It is a fully containerised system for monitoring and watering house plants with a raspberry pi.
details: Water.me is a fully containerised plant watering and monitoring system designed for deployment on a raspberry pi
The system consists of a NextJS frontend, a FastAPI backend, a PostgreSQL database, and a python daemon that monitors the plant statuses
The hardware for the project is a Rapsberry Pi 3B with
responsibilities_preamble: This project is a personal hobby project so I am responsible for the entirety of the design and implmentation
